member.summary: Gets the maximum number intersections that a shape can have when testing a line.

member.name: M:SixLabors.Shapes.ComplexPolygon.Distance(SixLabors.Primitives.PointF)
member.summary: the distance of the point from the outline of the shape, if the value is negative it is inside the polygon bounds
member.returns: Returns the distance from thr shape to the point
member.remarks: Due to the clipping we did during construction we know that out shapes do not overlap at there edges therefore for a point to be in more that one we must be in a hole of another, theoretically this could then flip again to be in a outline inside a hole inside an outline :)

The buffer that will be populated with intersections.
member.returns: The number of intersections populated into the buffer.
